title: Diane Douglas Lawsuit & Southern Exposure & Elio Motors Arizona Horizon Eight - Arizona
text: State Superintendent Diane Douglas has been sued by the State Baord of Education. Greg Miller, president of the board, will tell us.Join Tucson Weekly senior writer Jim Nintzel as he brings us up to date on issues from Southern Arizona. Weâ€™ll show you a new car being developed by a local company, Elio Motors, a two-passenger vehicle that gets 84 miles to the gallon and will be very affordable.
